data.short_description: [Website Bug] Applications with a long name get cut off in the list of applications
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to (https://discordapp(dot)com/developers/applications/) - Click on one of your applications or create one - Name it with a long name, it can't have contain spaces or otherwise it won't overflow - If you've named it with a long name, open the dropdown menu on the left side under "Selected App" - Observe the long named app on that list
